text: E fo, me Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn ghua, gumazir gavgaviba puvatɨziba amɨsevima me ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar dapanibar otifi. Ezɨ God akar dɨkɨrɨzim gamua uan ziam dɨbora ghaze, bar guizbangɨra, egha uan Otarim amɨsefe. Akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam, a Moses Osirizir Arazibar dughiamɨn gɨn otogha dagh afira. Ezɨ Ofa Gamir Gumazir Ekiabar Dapanir kam, a gumazir bar aghuim. Egha a en akurvaghamin gumazir bar faraghavɨra zuimɨn oto. Egh a ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.
